(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB only))
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB really))
        (NP (CD one) (NN ingredient))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP need)
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP
                  (ADJP (RB really) (JJ great))
                  (NN food))))))))
    (, ,)))


expl(is-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
advmod(is-2, only-3)
advmod(ingredient-6, really-4)
num(ingredient-6, one-5)
dep(is-2, ingredient-6)
mark(need-9, that-7)
nsubj(need-9, you-8)
ccomp(ingredient-6, need-9)
prep(need-9, for-10)
advmod(great-12, really-11)
amod(food-13, great-12)
pobj(for-10, food-13)


(ROOT
  (S (CC and)
    (NP (DT that))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (NN passion)))
    (. .)))


cc(passion-4, and-1)
nsubj(passion-4, that-2)
cop(passion-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, passion-4)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (ADVP (RB not) (RB just))
    (VP (VBZ passion))
    (, ,)))


cc(passion-4, But-1)
dep(just-3, not-2)
advmod(passion-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, passion-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBP need)
      (NP
        (NP (JJ unbridled) (NN passion))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ defies)
              (ADVP (RB practicality)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(need-3, you-1)
advmod(need-3, really-2)
root(ROOT-0, need-3)
amod(passion-5, unbridled-4)
dobj(need-3, passion-5)
nsubj(defies-7, that-6)
rcmod(passion-5, defies-7)
advmod(defies-7, practicality-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (ADVP (RB So)
        (NP
          (QP (JJ many) (NNS times))))
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN met)
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Chefs))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP who))
                (S
                  (VP (VBP are)
                    (ADJP (JJ passionate)
                      (PP (IN about)
                        (NP (PRP$ their) (NN cooking))))))))))))
    (CC but)
    (ADVP (RB somehow))
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (VP (VBN held)
          (ADVP (RB back)))))
    (. .)))


advmod(met-6, So-1)
quantmod(times-3, many-2)
pobj(So-1, times-3)
nsubj(met-6, I-4)
aux(met-6, have-5)
root(ROOT-0, met-6)
prep(met-6, with-7)
pobj(with-7, Chefs-8)
nsubj(passionate-11, who-9)
cop(passionate-11, are-10)
rcmod(Chefs-8, passionate-11)
prep(passionate-11, about-12)
poss(cooking-14, their-13)
pobj(about-12, cooking-14)
cc(met-6, but-15)
advmod(met-6, somehow-16)
nsubjpass(held-19, they-17)
auxpass(held-19, are-18)
ccomp(met-6, held-19)
advmod(held-19, back-20)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (VP (VBG working)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (NN someone) (RB else) (POS 's))
              (NN kitchen)))))
      (, ,))))


mark(working-4, If-1)
nsubj(working-4, they-2)
aux(working-4, are-3)
root(ROOT-0, working-4)
prep(working-4, in-5)
poss(kitchen-9, someone-6)
advmod(someone-6, else-7)
possessive(someone-6, 's-8)
pobj(in-5, kitchen-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN boss))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ clamps)
              (PRT (RP down))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (NN food) (NNS costs))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(boss-5, it-1)
cop(boss-5, is-2)
advmod(boss-5, always-3)
det(boss-5, the-4)
root(ROOT-0, boss-5)
nsubj(clamps-7, who-6)
rcmod(boss-5, clamps-7)
prt(clamps-7, down-8)
prep(clamps-7, on-9)
nn(costs-11, food-10)
pobj(on-9, costs-11)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (NP (DT the) (NN owner)))
      (, ,))))


advmod(owner-5, When-1)
nsubj(owner-5, they-2)
cop(owner-5, are-3)
det(owner-5, the-4)
root(ROOT-0, owner-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP
            (VP (VB think)
              (PP (IN about)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG keeping)
                    (S
                      (NP (DT the) (NN business))
                      (ADJP (RB afloat)))))))
            (CC and)
            (VP (NN time)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS families))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(have-2, they-1)
root(ROOT-0, have-2)
aux(think-4, to-3)
xcomp(have-2, think-4)
prep(think-4, about-5)
pcomp(about-5, keeping-6)
det(business-8, the-7)
nsubj(afloat-9, business-8)
xcomp(keeping-6, afloat-9)
cc(think-4, and-10)
conj(think-4, time-11)
prep(time-11, with-12)
poss(families-14, their-13)
pobj(with-12, families-14)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (DT the) (JJ initial) (NN fiery) (NN passion))
    (VP (VBZ gets)
      (VP (VBN toned)
        (PRT (RP down))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ slow) (NN simmer)))))
    (. .)))


dep(toned-7, So-1)
det(passion-5, the-2)
amod(passion-5, initial-3)
nn(passion-5, fiery-4)
nsubjpass(toned-7, passion-5)
auxpass(toned-7, gets-6)
root(ROOT-0, toned-7)
prt(toned-7, down-8)
prep(toned-7, to-9)
det(simmer-12, a-10)
amod(simmer-12, slow-11)
pobj(to-9, simmer-12)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (CD 87) (NNP Club) (NNP Street))
    (NP (# #) (CD 01-01))
    (NP (NNP Singapore) (CD 069455))))


num(Street-3, 87-1)
nn(Street-3, Club-2)
root(ROOT-0, Street-3)
dep(01-01-5, #-4)
dep(Street-3, 01-01-5)
dep(Street-3, Singapore-6)
num(Singapore-6, 069455-7)
